name: Introductory Algebra
description: An introductory course to the fundamentals of algebra.

name: Intermediate Algebra
description: A course to expand on the fundamentals of algebra.

name: Linear Algebra
description: A course to learn about the algebra of linear transformations.

name: Abstract Algebra
description: A course to learn about the algebra of abstract structures.

name: Real Analysis
description: A course to learn about the mathematical analysis of real numbers.

name: Complex Analysis
description: A course to learn about the mathematical analysis of complex numbers.

name: Advanced Algebra
description: An advanced course to learn about more advanced topics in algebra.
